pageContent:
Page 1 
Venky Davuluri 
Sr. MuleSoft Developer 
 
PROFESSIONAL OVERVIEW 
 
Experienced MuleSoft ESB Developer with a demonstrated history of 8 years work experience in multiple 
domains. Mule 4 certified developer. Mr. Davuluri has participated on teams doing analysis, design, 
development, enhancements, and testing of applications in these areas: Mule ESB, Anypoint platform, SOAP, 
Rest web services, Agile methodologies, RAML, Integrations, API’s and SOA based projects. Proficient in Java 
Technologies. 
 
Primary Roles 
• MuleSoft Developer 
• Senior Technical Consultant 
  
Primary 
Technologies 
• Mule ESB, MuleSoft Anypoint Platform, RAML 
• Service Oriented Architecture (SOA), EAI 
• SOAP, and REST API’s 
• Java/JEE/Eclipse 
 
 
Other 
Technologies 
• CloudHub, Anypoint Studio, Munit 
• Source Code Management (Git), Jenkins, Junit 
• Oracle, DB2, MS SQL – SQL & PL/SQL  
• Maven, Ant, XML, DTD, XSD, JAXB, XSLT 
• Postman, Jira, Confluence, splunk, SoapUI  
 
Key Industries

• Source Code Management (Git), Jenkins, Junit 
• Oracle, DB2, MS SQL – SQL & PL/SQL  
• Maven, Ant, XML, DTD, XSD, JAXB, XSLT 
• Postman, Jira, Confluence, splunk, SoapUI  
 
Key Industries 
Insurance, Logistics, Social Network, Auto Finance, Energy, Food Service & Hospitality 
 
 
 
Key Engagements 
   
   
Delaware North 
Phillips 66

to end that managing with multiple teams to deliver project 
within deadline.

Venky Davuluri, Sr. MuleSoft Developer 
 
Page 2

PROFESSIONAL AND BUSINESS EXPERIENCE 
 
Perficient, Inc.                                    Feb 2021 – Present 
Sr. Technical Consultant 
 
CLIENT: Delaware North 
 
As a senior technical consultant that participated in NetSuite, BigCommerce integrations to process the 
products, sales and inventory count data, RedShift database integration to update opportunities in Salesforce. 
Utilizing MuleSoft that I integrated with external systems (NetSuite, BigCommerce, Salesforce) and internal 
systems in above mentioned projects. 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Agile methodologies using two-week sprint for SDLC process.

systems in above mentioned projects.

insurance, farm insurance, motor vehicle reports and claim history information. Utilizing MuleSoft, Rest API’s

insurance, farm insurance, motor vehicle reports and claim history information. Utilizing MuleSoft, Rest API’s

CLIENT: Koch Supply & Trade             May 2017 - Feb 2018 
Position: MuleSoft Developer 
 
Participated in a Logistics and supply chain project. As a team member doing analysis, design, development, 
implementation, enhancements and testing of a Logistics and supply chain management which contains end to 
end tracking of large container ships and oil vessels, handling large data integration for shipments. Utilizing 
MuleSoft, Java, SQL & XML as major technologies I worked on the project. 
 
Responsibilities:  
• Agile methodologies using Scrum for SDLC for project management.  
• Working closely with integration team members to understand the business requirements.  
• Experience in using MuleSoft Anypoint platform including Design Center, Anypoint Exchange, Anypoint 
Studio, API Manager, Runtime Manager, and Anypoint Monitoring.

• Experience in using MuleSoft Anypoint platform including Design Center, Anypoint Exchange, Anypoint 
Studio, API Manager, Runtime Manager, and Anypoint Monitoring. 
• Experience in using connectors such as HTTP, FILE, MongoDB, Database, ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, JMS. 
• Experience on Restful API’s principles to create API specifications in Design Center using RAML. 
• Proficient in robust error handling mechanisms using Try-Scope, On-Error Propagate/continue, and custom 
error handlers in Mule Applications.  
• Deployed Mule ESB applications into Mule Management Console. 
• Developed Mule ESB artifact and configured the Mule configurations files and deployed. 
• Experience in Restful and SOAP Web Services in Mule ESB based on SOA Architecture. 
• Implemented Log4J components for logging. Perform daily monitoring of log files and resolve issues.  
• Hand-on experience in Azure DevOps for Creating pipelines for application deployment to all environments.

• Hand-on experience in Azure DevOps for Creating pipelines for application deployment to all environments.  
• Used custom logging framework for Mule ESB application. 
• Used application security with HTTPS, OAUTH 2.0, Secure Property Placeholder.  
• Hands on experience in creating http inbound & outbound flows and orchestration.  
• Developed three-layer architecture and extensively worked on system, process, and experience layers of 
different API's.  
• Used GitHub as source repository for versioning.  
• Good experience in Data Weave programming to transform the data. 
• Experience on postman for testing the application services and implemented Munit test cases. 
 
CLIENT: Tech Mahindra              May 2014 – Oct 2015 
Position: Java Developer 
 
Participated in projects as a java developer in development, implementation, enhancements, and testing. I 
worked on Logistics domain. Using web services integrated multiple customers data to track and update order

worked on Logistics domain. Using web services integrated multiple customers data to track and update order 
details. Involved in two major modules like asset management & inventory management. 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Involved in all the phases of SDLC process. 
• Analyzed the data and system requirements, conducted a meeting with QA team for writing test conditions 
and test scripts. 
• Involved in creating software requirement specification documents. 
• Developing interfaces that integrate billing using EJB stateless session beans. 
• Used EJB Entity Beans to map entity objects such as customer, account, and product to relational database 
table i.e., Oracle. 
• Deploying wars on Web logic application server and granting access to users. 
• Implemented Struts framework (Action & Controller classes) for dispatching requests to appropriate classes. 
• Used simple Struts Validation for user validations as per business logic & initial data loading.

• Used simple Struts Validation for user validations as per business logic & initial data loading. 
• Co-ordinate Application testing with the help of the testing team. 
• Involved in writing services to write core logic for business processes. 
• Writing JUNIT test cases for various implementations. 
• Used JSP, Servlets and JavaScript to mock data interchange between systems. 
• Created stored procedures and SQL queries to get/update billing data & send it back to system. 
• Developing SOAP web services to be shared with system to interact with Prime Biller. 
• Creating the DEV build and resolving different build issues. 
• Involved in validating billing data that included data exchange from the system. 
• Ran check styles, PMD Defects &find bugs and fixed them if there are any. 
• Used XML and XSL extensively as the script logic was completely separated from the UI. 
• Implemented Maven as build and configuration tool.
